product_name: SunCloud Carousel Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: From the slopes in winter to the beaches in summer, the SunCloud Carousel Polarized Sunglasses help protect your eyes from glare and UV rays without sacrificing style. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and 1/3 the weight; they're also acid- and heat-resistant. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they're extremely impact resistant. White frames feature polarized brown lenses to eliminate glare and produce the truest transmission of natural colors. The SunCloud Carousel Polarized Sunglasses are sized to fit medium/large profiles. Closeout.
short_description: From the slopes in winter to the beaches in summer, the SunCloud Carousel Polarized Sunglasses help protect your eyes from glare and UV rays without sacrificing style.
